Title: Directs the Rochester city school district to conduct a referendum regarding the suspension of the school board
Summary: Directs the Rochester city school district to conduct a referendum regarding the suspension of the school board; provides that, if approved, the superintendent shall assume administrative and budgetary decisions for the district in consultation with the department of education, for a period of five years.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the Rochester city school district to conduct a referendum regarding the suspension of the school board
